review: Got it to only use netflix. Does just that. Not sure if you bought amazon prime if everything is free but its frustrating to clickon what you want and it isnt free. I have yet to find a free show i actually want to watch.

review: I'm pleased.  No problems except main enter button sticks easily and keys are very senstive--if you press too long multiple presses are detected.But once you learn how to press quickly it's ok.

review: Roku Stick has more Apps. Fire TV Stick has better picture quality.

review: I really like the fire stick, but I get a constant crackling after a few minutes of rebooting it. This has happened on 2 TVs so far.
